job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pSolve Finance is an independent debt advisor transforming an industry built on leadgeneration and hidden cost business models We arent your typical fintech or findata company were building an interface for borrowing that works for users not their lenders So no referral fees or advice you cant rely on Instead we offer a simple plainfree shopping refinancing and monitoring hub that works for the user through aligned incentives we earn a tenth of what they savenbspppnbspppWe are seeking talented Software Engineers to add to our team to help people save money on debtnbsp We householdsnbspppnbspppAs an early team member you will build out our systems front to back and everything in between We use Jamstack and leverage Google Cloud Platform serverless compute big data and AI capabilitiesnbspppbrppWe are primarily a Javascript shop NodeReact but are always open to using the right tool for the job We take every opportunity to integrate a DevOps and DataOps
